<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Helper class that can turn branches and switches with constant conditions</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-loopsimplifycfg-cpp-/constantterminatorfoldingimpl"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-loopsimplifycfg-cpp-/constantterminatorfoldingimpl/#a13b60422fa4f190649589e12d3443f61">ConstantTerminatorFoldingImpl</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Whether or not the current loop has irreducible CFG.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> HasIrreducibleCFG = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Whether or not the current loop will still exist after terminator constant</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// folding will be done. In theory, there are two ways how it can happen:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// 1 Loop&#39;s latch(es) become unreachable from loop header;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// 2 Loop&#39;s header becomes unreachable from method entry.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// In practice, the second situation is impossible because we only modify the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// current loop and its preheader and do not affect preheader&#39;s reachibility</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// from any other block. So this variable set to true means that loop&#39;s latch</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// has become unreachable from loop header.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> DeleteCurrentLoop = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The blocks of the original loop that will still be reachable from entry</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// after the constant folding.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrset">SmallPtrSet&lt;BasicBlock &#42;, 8&gt;</a> LiveLoopBlocks;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The blocks of the original loop that will become unreachable from entry</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// after the constant folding.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;BasicBlock &#42;, 8&gt;</a> DeadLoopBlocks;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The exits of the original loop that will still be reachable from entry</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// after the constant folding.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrset">SmallPtrSet&lt;BasicBlock &#42;, 8&gt;</a> LiveExitBlocks;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The exits of the original loop that will become unreachable from entry</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// after the constant folding.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;BasicBlock &#42;, 8&gt;</a> DeadExitBlocks;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The blocks that will still be a part of the current loop after folding.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrset">SmallPtrSet&lt;BasicBlock &#42;, 8&gt;</a> BlocksInLoopAfterFolding;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The blocks that have terminators with constant condition that can be</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// folded. Note: fold candidates should be in L but not in any of its</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// subloops to avoid complex LI updates.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;BasicBlock &#42;, 8&gt;</a> FoldCandidates;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a03503773241005f01b090b9862aad304">dump</a>()</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Constant terminator folding for loop &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; L &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;\\n&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(DFS.isComplete() &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;DFS is expected to be finished&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Index of a basic block in RPO traversal.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">DenseMap&lt;const BasicBlock &#42;, unsigned&gt;</a> RPO;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Current = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = DFS.beginRPO(), E = DFS.endRPO(); <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> != E; ++<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><Highlight kind="normal">      RPO&#91;&#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>&#93; = Current++;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = DFS.beginRPO(), E = DFS.endRPO(); <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> != E; ++<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;BB = &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;Succ : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a26e2a938b431eaa6eca2beaa96410c9d">successors</a>(BB))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (L.contains(Succ) &amp;&amp; !LI.isLoopHeader(Succ) &amp;&amp; RPO&#91;BB&#93; &gt; RPO&#91;Succ&#93;)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If an edge goes from a block with greater order number into a block</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// with lesses number, and it is not a loop backedge, then it can only</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// be a part of irreducible non-loop cycle.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Fill all information about status of blocks and exits of the current loop</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// if constant folding of all branches will be done.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> analyze() &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><Highlight kind="normal">    DFS.perform(&amp;LI);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(DFS.isComplete() &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;DFS is expected to be finished&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// TODO: The algorithm below relies on both RPO and Postorder traversals.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// When the loop has only reducible CFG inside, then the invariant &quot;all</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// predecessors of X are processed before X in RPO&quot; is preserved. However</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// an irreducible loop can break this invariant (e.g. latch does not have to</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// be the last block in the traversal in this case, and the algorithm relies</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// on this). We can later decide to support such cases by altering the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// algorithms, but so far we just give up analyzing them.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (hasIrreducibleCFG(DFS)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"><Highlight kind="normal">      HasIrreducibleCFG = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Collect live and dead loop blocks and exits.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"><Highlight kind="normal">    LiveLoopBlocks.insert(L.getHeader());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = DFS.beginRPO(), E = DFS.endRPO(); <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> != E; ++<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;BB = &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If a loop block wasn&#39;t marked as live so far, then it&#39;s dead.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!LiveLoopBlocks.count(BB)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"><Highlight kind="normal">        DeadLoopBlocks.push&#95;back(BB);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="227"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="228"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="229"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;TheOnlySucc = <a href="#a31aca34b2768bfd5917289a053674bd1">getOnlyLiveSuccessor</a>(BB);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="231"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If a block has only one live successor, it&#39;s a candidate on constant</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="233"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// folding. Only handle blocks from current loop: branches in child loops</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="234"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// are skipped because if they can be folded, they should be folded during</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="235"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the processing of child loops.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="236"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> TakeFoldCandidate = TheOnlySucc &amp;&amp; LI.getLoopFor(BB) == &amp;L;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="237"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (TakeFoldCandidate)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="238"><Highlight kind="normal">        FoldCandidates.push&#95;back(BB);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="239"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="240"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Handle successors.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;Succ : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a26e2a938b431eaa6eca2beaa96410c9d">successors</a>(BB))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="242"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!TakeFoldCandidate || TheOnlySucc == Succ) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (L.contains(Succ))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244"><Highlight kind="normal">            LiveLoopBlocks.insert(Succ);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"><Highlight kind="normal">            LiveExitBlocks.insert(Succ);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"><Highlight kind="normal">        &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Amount of dead and live loop blocks should match the total number of</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// blocks in loop.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(L.getNumBlocks() == LiveLoopBlocks.size() + DeadLoopBlocks.size() &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"><Highlight kind="normal">           </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Malformed block sets?&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Now, all exit blocks that are not marked as live are dead, if all their</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// predecessors are in the loop. This may not be the case, as the input loop</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// may not by in loop-simplify/canonical form.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="258"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;BasicBlock &#42;, 8&gt;</a> ExitBlocks;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"><Highlight kind="normal">    L.getExitBlocks(ExitBlocks);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="260"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrset">SmallPtrSet&lt;BasicBlock &#42;, 8&gt;</a> UniqueDeadExits;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="261"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;ExitBlock : ExitBlocks)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="262"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!LiveExitBlocks.count(ExitBlock) &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="263"><Highlight kind="normal">          UniqueDeadExits.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimpl/#a9d834ae3da8c62c2b668dada51335eb0">insert</a>(ExitBlock).second &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="264"><Highlight kind="normal">          <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0d10fe510ced2849a8074fe81e5d04ce">all&#95;of</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#acb22fb04083152eee862457e42e8dc31">predecessors</a>(ExitBlock),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="265"><Highlight kind="normal">                 &#91;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">this</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#93;(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;Pred) &#123; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> L.contains(Pred); &#125;))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="266"><Highlight kind="normal">        DeadExitBlocks.push&#95;back(ExitBlock);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="267"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="268"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Whether or not the edge From-&gt;To will still be present in graph after the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="269"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// folding.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="270"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> IsEdgeLive = &#91;&amp;&#93;(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;From, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;To) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="271"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!LiveLoopBlocks.count(From))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="272"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="273"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;TheOnlySucc = <a href="#a31aca34b2768bfd5917289a053674bd1">getOnlyLiveSuccessor</a>(From);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="274"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> !TheOnlySucc || TheOnlySucc == To || LI.getLoopFor(From) != &amp;L;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="275"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="276"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="277"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The loop will not be destroyed if its latch is live.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00278" /><CodeLine lineNumber="278"><Highlight kind="normal">    DeleteCurrentLoop = !IsEdgeLive(L.getLoopLatch(), L.getHeader());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="279"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00280" /><CodeLine lineNumber="280"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If we are going to delete the current loop completely, no extra analysis</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00281" /><CodeLine lineNumber="281"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// is needed.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00282" /><CodeLine lineNumber="282"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (DeleteCurrentLoop)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00283" /><CodeLine lineNumber="283"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00284" /><CodeLine lineNumber="284"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="285"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Otherwise, we should check which blocks will still be a part of the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="286"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// current loop after the transform.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="287"><Highlight kind="normal">    BlocksInLoopAfterFolding.insert(L.getLoopLatch());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="288"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the loop is live, then we should compute what blocks are still in</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00289" /><CodeLine lineNumber="289"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// loop after all branch folding has been done. A block is in loop if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00290" /><CodeLine lineNumber="290"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// it has a live edge to another block that is in the loop; by definition,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00291" /><CodeLine lineNumber="291"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// latch is in the loop.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00292" /><CodeLine lineNumber="292"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> BlockIsInLoop = &#91;&amp;&#93;(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;BB) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00293" /><CodeLine lineNumber="293"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a61d13d6824ec46c31260a4fd0997eda0">any&#95;of</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a26e2a938b431eaa6eca2beaa96410c9d">successors</a>(BB), &#91;&amp;&#93;(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;Succ) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00294" /><CodeLine lineNumber="294"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> BlocksInLoopAfterFolding.count(Succ) &amp;&amp; IsEdgeLive(BB, Succ);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00295" /><CodeLine lineNumber="295"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00296" /><CodeLine lineNumber="296"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00297" /><CodeLine lineNumber="297"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = DFS.beginPostorder(), E = DFS.endPostorder(); <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> != E; ++<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00298" /><CodeLine lineNumber="298"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;BB = &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00299" /><CodeLine lineNumber="299"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (BlockIsInLoop(BB))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00300" /><CodeLine lineNumber="300"><Highlight kind="normal">        BlocksInLoopAfterFolding.insert(BB);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00301" /><CodeLine lineNumber="301"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00302" /><CodeLine lineNumber="302"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00303" /><CodeLine lineNumber="303"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(BlocksInLoopAfterFolding.count(L.getHeader()) &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00304" /><CodeLine lineNumber="304"><Highlight kind="normal">           </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Header not in loop?&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00305" /><CodeLine lineNumber="305"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(BlocksInLoopAfterFolding.size() &lt;= LiveLoopBlocks.size() &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00306" /><CodeLine lineNumber="306"><Highlight kind="normal">           </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;All blocks that stay in loop should be live!&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00307" /><CodeLine lineNumber="307"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00308" /><CodeLine lineNumber="308"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00309" /><CodeLine lineNumber="309"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// We need to preserve static reachibility of all loop exit blocks (this is)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00310" /><CodeLine lineNumber="310"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// required by loop pass manager. In order to do it, we make the following</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00311" /><CodeLine lineNumber="311"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// trick:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00312" /><CodeLine lineNumber="312"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00313" /><CodeLine lineNumber="313"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///  preheader:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00314" /><CodeLine lineNumber="314"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///    &lt;preheader code&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00315" /><CodeLine lineNumber="315"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///    br label %loop&#95;header</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00316" /><CodeLine lineNumber="316"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00317" /><CodeLine lineNumber="317"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///  loop&#95;header:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00318" /><CodeLine lineNumber="318"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///    ...</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00319" /><CodeLine lineNumber="319"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///    br i1 false, label %dead&#95;exit, label %loop&#95;block</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00320" /><CodeLine lineNumber="320"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///    ...</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00321" /><CodeLine lineNumber="321"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00322" /><CodeLine lineNumber="322"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// We cannot simply remove edge from the loop to dead exit because in this</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00323" /><CodeLine lineNumber="323"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// case dead&#95;exit (and its successors) may become unreachable. To avoid that,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00324" /><CodeLine lineNumber="324"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// we insert the following fictive preheader:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00325" /><CodeLine lineNumber="325"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00326" /><CodeLine lineNumber="326"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///  preheader:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00327" /><CodeLine lineNumber="327"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///    &lt;preheader code&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="328"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///    switch i32 0, label %preheader-split,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="329"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///                  &#91;i32 1, label %dead&#95;exit&#95;1&#93;,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="330"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///                  &#91;i32 2, label %dead&#95;exit&#95;2&#93;,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="331"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///                  ...</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="332"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///                  &#91;i32 N, label %dead&#95;exit&#95;N&#93;,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="333"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="334"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///  preheader-split:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="335"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///    br label %loop&#95;header</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="336"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="337"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///  loop&#95;header:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="338"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///    ...</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="339"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///    br i1 false, label %dead&#95;exit&#95;N, label %loop&#95;block</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="340"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///    ...</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="341"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="342"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Doing so, we preserve static reachibility of all dead exits and can later</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="343"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// remove edges from the loop to these blocks.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="344"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> handleDeadExits() &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="345"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If no dead exits, nothing to do.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="346"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (DeadExitBlocks.empty())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00347" /><CodeLine lineNumber="347"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00348" /><CodeLine lineNumber="348"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00349" /><CodeLine lineNumber="349"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Construct split preheader and the dummy switch to thread edges from it to</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="350"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// dead exits.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="351"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;Preheader = L.getLoopPreheader();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="352"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;NewPreheader = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac6c9ffe7979754415f4ca0d677174bc2">llvm::SplitBlock</a>(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="353"><Highlight kind="normal">        Preheader, Preheader-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#aef9e9fcf4c5dfce90276ca16d91b8e46">getTerminator</a>(), &amp;DT, &amp;LI, MSSAU);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="354"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="355"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilder">IRBuilder&lt;&gt;</a> Builder(Preheader-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#aef9e9fcf4c5dfce90276ca16d91b8e46">getTerminator</a>());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00356" /><CodeLine lineNumber="356"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/switchinst">SwitchInst</a> &#42;DummySwitch =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00357" /><CodeLine lineNumber="357"><Highlight kind="normal">        Builder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#a8b123015de85b2f41b0deda2aeaad9d3">CreateSwitch</a>(Builder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#a8246a9e9405ffe2a9d8d020a949c8e96">getInt32</a>(0), NewPreheader);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00358" /><CodeLine lineNumber="358"><Highlight kind="normal">    Preheader-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#aef9e9fcf4c5dfce90276ca16d91b8e46">getTerminator</a>()-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction/#a601ee49a4c4e0babf29bd1cf09036570">eraseFromParent</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="359"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00360" /><CodeLine lineNumber="360"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> DummyIdx = 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00361" /><CodeLine lineNumber="361"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;BB : DeadExitBlocks) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00362" /><CodeLine lineNumber="362"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Eliminate all Phis and LandingPads from dead exits.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="363"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// TODO: Consider removing all instructions in this dead block.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="364"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;Instruction &#42;, 4&gt;</a> DeadInstructions;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00365" /><CodeLine lineNumber="365"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;PN : BB-&gt;phis())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00366" /><CodeLine lineNumber="366"><Highlight kind="normal">        DeadInstructions.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(&amp;PN);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00367" /><CodeLine lineNumber="367"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00368" /><CodeLine lineNumber="368"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;LandingPad = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;LandingPadInst&gt;</a>(BB-&gt;getFirstNonPHIIt()))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00369" /><CodeLine lineNumber="369"><Highlight kind="normal">        DeadInstructions.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl/#a396fcfee6914c76974b73c3d203da6a5">emplace&#95;back</a>(LandingPad);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00370" /><CodeLine lineNumber="370"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00371" /><CodeLine lineNumber="371"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> : DeadInstructions) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00372" /><CodeLine lineNumber="372"><Highlight kind="normal">        SE.forgetBlockAndLoopDispositions(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00373" /><CodeLine lineNumber="373"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;replaceAllUsesWith(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/poisonvalue/#a1bf08613fb664a2e377a9a72c59a6b66">PoisonValue::get</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;getType()));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00374" /><CodeLine lineNumber="374"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;eraseFromParent();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00375" /><CodeLine lineNumber="375"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00376" /><CodeLine lineNumber="376"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00377" /><CodeLine lineNumber="377"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(DummyIdx != 0 &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Too many dead exits!&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00378" /><CodeLine lineNumber="378"><Highlight kind="normal">      DummySwitch-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/switchinst/#a62abc2475d09c01d583ba24a487898fd">addCase</a>(Builder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#a8246a9e9405ffe2a9d8d020a949c8e96">getInt32</a>(DummyIdx++), BB);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00379" /><CodeLine lineNumber="379"><Highlight kind="normal">      DTUpdates.push&#95;back(&#123;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dominatortreebase/#a9aeeca2833810f01b20545a46fe22503">DominatorTree::Insert</a>, Preheader, BB&#125;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00380" /><CodeLine lineNumber="380"><Highlight kind="normal">      ++NumLoopExitsDeleted;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00381" /><CodeLine lineNumber="381"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00382" /><CodeLine lineNumber="382"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00383" /><CodeLine lineNumber="383"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(L.getLoopPreheader() == NewPreheader &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Malformed CFG?&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00384" /><CodeLine lineNumber="384"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42;OuterLoop = LI.getLoopFor(Preheader)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00385" /><CodeLine lineNumber="385"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// When we break dead edges, the outer loop may become unreachable from</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00386" /><CodeLine lineNumber="386"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the current loop. We need to fix loop info accordingly. For this, we</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00387" /><CodeLine lineNumber="387"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// find the most nested loop that still contains L and remove L from all</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00388" /><CodeLine lineNumber="388"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// loops that are inside of it.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00389" /><CodeLine lineNumber="389"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42;StillReachable = <a href="#a44102f5040261d1ac399f288fc2c4a68">getInnermostLoopFor</a>(LiveExitBlocks, L, LI);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00390" /><CodeLine lineNumber="390"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00391" /><CodeLine lineNumber="391"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Okay, our loop is no longer in the outer loop (and maybe not in some of</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00392" /><CodeLine lineNumber="392"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// its parents as well). Make the fixup.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00393" /><CodeLine lineNumber="393"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (StillReachable != OuterLoop) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00394" /><CodeLine lineNumber="394"><Highlight kind="normal">        LI.changeLoopFor(NewPreheader, StillReachable);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00395" /><CodeLine lineNumber="395"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="#af4fe7de52124908c8a757ea62ac9c59b">removeBlockFromLoops</a>(NewPreheader, OuterLoop, StillReachable);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00396" /><CodeLine lineNumber="396"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;BB : L.blocks())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00397" /><CodeLine lineNumber="397"><Highlight kind="normal">          <a href="#af4fe7de52124908c8a757ea62ac9c59b">removeBlockFromLoops</a>(BB, OuterLoop, StillReachable);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00398" /><CodeLine lineNumber="398"><Highlight kind="normal">        OuterLoop-&gt;removeChildLoop(&amp;L);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00399" /><CodeLine lineNumber="399"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (StillReachable)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00400" /><CodeLine lineNumber="400"><Highlight kind="normal">          StillReachable-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopbase/#a990a86b0de7a84a9f489d2034878e330">addChildLoop</a>(&amp;L);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00401" /><CodeLine lineNumber="401"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00402" /><CodeLine lineNumber="402"><Highlight kind="normal">          LI.addTopLevelLoop(&amp;L);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00403" /><CodeLine lineNumber="403"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00404" /><CodeLine lineNumber="404"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Some values from loops in &#91;OuterLoop, StillReachable) could be used</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00405" /><CodeLine lineNumber="405"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// in the current loop. Now it is not their child anymore, so such uses</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00406" /><CodeLine lineNumber="406"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// require LCSSA Phis.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00407" /><CodeLine lineNumber="407"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42;FixLCSSALoop = OuterLoop;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00408" /><CodeLine lineNumber="408"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (FixLCSSALoop-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopbase/#ae34bcd53f75fab0c03b509ecccb4cfaf">getParentLoop</a>() != StillReachable)</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00440" /><CodeLine lineNumber="440"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The function LI.erase has some invariants that need to be preserved when</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00441" /><CodeLine lineNumber="441"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// it tries to remove a loop which is not the top-level loop. In particular,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00442" /><CodeLine lineNumber="442"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// it requires loop&#39;s preheader to be strictly in loop&#39;s parent. We cannot</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00444" /><CodeLine lineNumber="444"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// break this invariant for the dead loop. So we detatch and erase all dead</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00445" /><CodeLine lineNumber="445"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// loops beforehand.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
